solution_line_template: First find the total number of children: {peas_preferring_kids} kids + {carrots_preferring_kids} kids + {corn_preferring_kids} kids = <<{peas_preferring_kids}+{carrots_preferring_kids}+{corn_preferring_kids}={total_kids}>>{total_kids} kids

Then divide the number of kids who prefer corn by the total number of kids and multiply by {percentage_multiplier}% to express as a percentage: {corn_preferring_kids} kids / {total_kids} kids * {percentage_multiplier}% = {percentage_corn_preferring}%
